Trade/Device Name(s): RapidSense Drugs of Abuse Methamphetamine (MET) 1000 Device
RapidSense Drugs of Abuse Methamphetamine (MET) 1000 Device, model 900-0050
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for RapidSense Methamphetamine lateral flow immunoassay device for qualitative detection of methamphetamine in urine
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of methamphetamine in human urine at 1000 ng/mL cutoff using a lateral flow competitive immunoassay, for professional laboratory use by healthcare professionals
